name: Space Squirrel
description:
• Basic commands:
  • Arrow Keys
  • color keys:
  • [ Q ] -> green
  • [ W ] -> red
  • [ E ] -> blue
  • [ R ] -> yellow

Based in the retro shooter spaceships games. Someone need to destroy the meteors around the planet, for this we need their help... The flying squirrels need to save our planet!
